title: Citi Celebrates 45 Years of Presence and 25 Years of Consumer Banking in Bahrain
summary: Bahrain - Citi Bahrain celebrated 45 years of presence and 25 years of Consumer Banking operations in the Kingdom. Held at the Ritz Carlton Hotel in Manama, the celebration was hosted by Jim Cowles, Citi's Chief Executive Officer for Europe, Middle East & Africa, who visited Bahrain recently, as well as Atiq Ur-Rehman, Citi's Chief Executive Officer for the Middle East and North Africa, and Mazin Manna, Citi Country Officer for Bahrain.
tag-1: Citi Celebrates 45 Years of Presence and 25 Years of Consumer Banking in Bahrain
tag-2: Bahrain – Citi Bahrain celebrated 45 years of presence and 25 years of Consumer Banking operations in the Kingdom. Held at the Ritz Carlton Hotel in Manama, the celebration was hosted by Jim Cowles, Citi's Chief Executive Officer for Europe, Middle East & Africa, who visited Bahrain recently, as well as Atiq Ur-Rehman, Citi's Chief Executive Officer for the Middle East and North Africa, and Mazin Manna, Citi Country Officer for Bahrain.
tag-3: Mr. Manna said: "Citi Bahrain has been a partner in the Kingdom's progress for over four decades, and intends to enhance its value-added services to clients and investors, as well as expand its foothold in Bahrain. Today's celebration is a salute to our clients for their contiuous support and loyalty, and a reiteration of our commitment to the local market."
tag-4: Citi has been present in Bahrain since 1969. The bank's Institutional capabilities include Corporate & Investment Banking, Capital Markets, Sales & Trading, Transactions Services and Islamic Banking, while its Consumer Banking arm, Citibank, has been offering a range Wealth Management and Consumer Credit services since its launch in 1989.
tag-5: Throughout this period, Citibank pioneered a number of consumer banking firsts, including:
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.

tag-8: Citibank Bahrain's Branch Network Citibank's branch network in Bahrain includes three branches and one Financial Centers (or Electronic Banking Units) located at the Bahrain Mall.
